   19: %%
   20: -module(groups_spec_1_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% INFO FUNCS
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [{timetrap,1000}].
   31: 
   32: group(_) ->
   33:     [{timetrap,2000}].
   34: 
   35: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   36: %% CONFIG FUNCS
   37: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   38: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   39:     Config.
   40: 
   41: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   42:     ok.
   43: 
   44: init_per_group(G, Config) ->
   45:     GrProps = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
   46:     GrProps1 = proplists:delete(name, GrProps),
   47:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("init( ~w ): ~p", [G, GrProps1])),
   48:     ct:pal("init( ~w ): ~p", [G, GrProps1]),
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: end_per_group(G, Config) ->
   52:     GrProps = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
   53:     GrProps1 = proplists:delete(name, GrProps),
   54:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("end( ~w ): ~p", [G, GrProps1])),
   55:     ct:pal("end( ~w ): ~p", [G, GrProps1]),
   56:     ok.
   57: 
   58: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   59:     Config.
   60: 
   61: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   62:     ok.
   63: 
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: %% TEST DECLARATIONS
   66: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: 
   68: groups() ->
   69:     [
   70:      {g1,[],[t11,t12,t13]},
   71:      {g2,[sequence],[t21,{group,g3},t22,{group,g4},t23]},
   72:      {g3,[parallel],[t31,t32,t33]},
   73:      {g4,[],[t41,{group,g5},t42]},
   74:      {g5,[parallel],[t51,t52,t53,t54]}
   75:     ].
   76: 
   77: all() -> 
   78:     [
   79:      {group,g1,default},
   80:      {group,g1,[sequence]},
   81:      {group,g1,[parallel],[]},
   82:      
   83:      {group,g2,[],[]},
   84:      {group,g2,default,[{g3,[sequence]}]},
   85:      {group,g2,[],[{g4,[sequence],[{g5,[sequence]}]},{g3,[sequence]}]}
   86:     ].
   87: 
   88: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   89: %% TEST CASES
   90: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   91: 
   92: t11(_) ->
   93:     ok.
   94: t12(_) ->
   95:     exit(crashes).
   96: t13(_) ->
   97:     ok.
   98: 
   99: t21(_) ->
  100:     ok.
  101: t22(_) ->
  102:     exit(crashes).
  103: t23(_) ->
  104:     ok.
  105: 
  106: t31(_) ->
  107:     ok.
  108: t32(_) ->
  109:     exit(crashes).
  110: t33(_) ->
  111:     ok.
  112: 
  113: t41(_) ->
  114:     ok.	
  115: t42(_) ->
  116:     exit(crashes).
  117: 
  118: t51(_) ->
  119:     ok.
  120: t52(_) ->
  121:     ct:sleep(3000).
  122: t53(_) ->
  123:     exit(crashes).
  124: t54(_) ->
  125:     ok.
